thread.title: Magna Carta deemed too sensitive for public display in China
thread.title_full: Magna Carta deemed too sensitive for public display in China

author: -NO AUTHOR-
title: Magna Carta deemed too sensitive for public display in China
text:
Magna Carta deemed too sensitive for public display in China 800-year-old document abruptly removed from Beijing university Published: 7 hours ago 
(Shanghaiist) Plans to hold an exhibition displaying one of the four remaining copies of the Magna Carta at Renmin University in Beijing were unexpectedly scrapped at the last minute. With little warning the exhibition was moved to the British Ambassador’s residence in Beijing, where it was decidedly more inaccessible to its Chinese audience. 
The exhibition is part of a seven-country tour celebrating the Magna Carta’s 800th anniversary, which was originally written and ratified in 1215. 
Champions of constitutional government treasure the Magna Carta as the bedrock of today’s democracy.
